title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2607.1 - Technical services and assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2607.1 - Technical services and assistance

State Regulations
(a) The division will render to neighborhood
preservation companies such technical services and assistance as it may possess
or as may be available to it to enable such companies to comply with the intent
and provision of this Chapter and article XVI of the Private Housing Finance

Law. (b) The division may, subject
to the availability of funds appropriated for the purposes of the neighborhood
perservation program, also contract with municipal and other public agencies
and with private persons, firms and corporations, including neighborhood
preservation companies, for the provision of such technical service and
assistance. (c) Assistance may
include the provision of technical services in: (1)
preparation and submission of contract
proposals; (2)
preparation and
submission of required reports; (3)
internal organization and management of companies; (4)
the area of technology transfer between
neighborhood preservation companies as selected by the division; and
(5)
other technical advice or assistance
relating to the performance or rendition of neighborhood preservation
activities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2607.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
